div.label: Residency Expiration Date In Hijri
div.div: Please provide Residency Expiration Date In Hijri.
Please provide Child Date od Birth.
Please provide Child Date od Birth.

div.h6: It is preferable to register all certificates available to you

t.t-foreach: appl.appl_documents_ids.filtered(lambda d:d.in_portal and d.doc_type not in ['father_birth','mother_birth','spouse_birth','child_birth','experience',])

div.p: For Fill Profile If Every thing fine you can send application to HR by click submit button
